front.title: Running IKE Phase 2 over Artificial Kerberos IKE SA

abstract.t: This document defines how to create artificial IKE SA using kerberos. It defines how to calculate SKEYID, cookies and IV needed by the IKE SA from the Kerberos session key. After the artificial IKE SA is created, it can be used to run normal IKE [RFC-2409] phase 2 negotiations. Those negotiations include quick Mode (creating IPsec SA), new group mode, delete notifications, and error notifications.
